28.ara-name: كتاب الطب عن رسول اللَّهِ صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abu Khizamah narrated from his father who said:"I asked the Messenger of Allah (S.A.W): 'O Messenger of Allah(S.A.W)! Do you think that the Ruqyah we use, the treatments we use, and what we seek to protect ourselves will contradict anything from Allah's Decree?' He said: 'They are from Allah's Decree

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الرُّقَى وَالأَدْوِيَةِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Ruqyah and Medication
